inclusion.criterion: severe, recurrent, certain or suspected reflex syncopes
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Reflex syncopes due to reversible causes
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Non-syncopal causes of transient loss of consciousness
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 65 yo man with history of CAD and prior MI, HLD, HTN, ventricular tachycardia, and syncope was admitted earlier today evaluation of syncope and ventricular arrhythmias.
